whatWhy.title: What and Why?
paragraphs: The purpose of this site is to present what I like to do, and it was created out of the necessity of showing off my work and my aptitudes since they fall out of what my academic formation demonstrates. It's a compendium of activities and projects solely related to software development. Everything was made (or is going to be made), following these principles: accessibility, performance and aesthetics. The source code of this site is open source and its freely available on Github under the MIT license. You can get it through my GitHub profile (on top), or you can go directly clicking here.

aesthetics.title: Aesthetics
paragraphs: Perhabs it is beest to clarify why I'am not talking about design here. Firstly, I'm not in any way saying that design is aesthetics, or confusing one with another.
